column5: One of my pool buddy's who lived in Sweden for many years said today is there big party. They drink and eat crayfish. Don't think it's like the down south redneck thing  unds fun.
Here is a short video of just one of the Crawfish festivals that happen all over the South.
Here is a short Swedish Crawfish party video you decide which one you want to attend.

In Finland it is called JUHANNUS. The party does not start til the evening. Midsummers Eve is filled with bonfires, dancing and copious drinking. On the longest day of the year there is only 3-4 hours of night, so the party goes on til the sun rises.  I have not participated in a long time. Very few Finns here in Niagara

The local Zhers here use to carry them. Was great to have on the grill while cooking up what ever I was cooking. Eat,m up while was cooking . I was the only one that would eat them. I have found a store local here that carry's them . Big box load. Aint cheap though. $55 for a box. From NFLD. Crawdads are good eats.
Misfish, what's the name of the store?  Barrie is a fair hike from my neck of the woods but I'd stop to buy crawfish next time I pass through!!
Neighbour is Croatian, lots of cheering and partying going on there yesterday.
